question: Which city is the venue of the ICT Academy Bridge 2019 conference?
explanation: In Tamil Nadu, the 37th edition of the ICT Academy Bridge 2019 conference was held in Chennai with theme â€œFostering India for Industry 4.0\". The event brought together industry experts, academic leaders and government policy-makers to address the challenges faced by India Inc. in the era of Fourth Industrial Revolution & therefore creating a correlated education ecosystem and formulating a strategic regulatory framework.  It is the largest Industry-Institute Interaction Event of Asia and is organized by ICT Academy. The city witnessed more than 1,000 participants from government, industry and academia.
